Key Match Events: Nick Castellanos homered in his first at bat
Nick Castellanos drew a two-out walk and scored the winning run in his penultimate plate appearance
Castellanos made a lunging catch in right field to prevent the tying run from reaching base in the top of the eighth
Nick Castellanos was plunked again in the bottom of the eighth
Pre-Game Insights: Kevin Cash apologized to Nick Castellanos before the game
Cash recognized the foul play and admitted it was wrong
Post-Match Reflections: Nick Castellanos appreciated Cash's apology and respected his honesty
The Phillies won 3-2 and swept the Rays
Miscellaneous Highlights: Weston Wilson drove in the game-winning run
Three reserve players from Triple-A Lehigh Valley contributed to the wins
Aramis Ramirez threw out the tying run trying to steal second base in the ninth inning
